title: Dashboard Dictionary for Fairlearn
description: The original JSON format for fairness dashboards

precomputedMetrics.description: A 2D grid of metrics, indexed as precomputedMetric[sensitive_feature][model]

items.description: The metric objects. The list of keys is determined by predictionType

predictedY.description: A list of predictions. The first dimension must be the same length as modelNames

items.description: A list of predicted samples for a given model

predictionType.description: Specifies the set of metrics contained

binLabels.description: The subgroups identified by the sensitive feature

binVector.description: The sensitive feature values (indexes into binLabels)

featureBinName.description: The name of the sensitive feature

group-metric.description: Contains the named metric evaluated on each group

bins.description: The metric evaluated for each subgroup of the corresponding sensitive feature

global.description: The metric evaluated on the whole dataset
